name: The Cold Shoulder
description:
You're an invisible goblin who's skilled in assassination. Unfortunately, your new missions takes you to a frozen archipelago in the far north. Your enemies can't see you but your footprints in the snow are very visible.

Assets used:

 - Music: 8BIT Music Album by GWriterStudio

 - Sound Effects: mixkit.co

 - Art/Tiles:  GameDevMarket.net

My submission to the 1Up Game Jam 2021.
